Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Fairbanks
ShortDescription: WB 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State due to, street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State, due to street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Grand/Fairbanks
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State: due to,street blockage near  Grand/Fairbank.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses buses are temporarily rerouted via  Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State including the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near  Grand/Fairbanks.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at 18th/Paulina
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Wood, 17th, Ashland and 18th due to, street blockage near 18th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Wood, 17th, Ashland and 18th, due to street blockage near 18th/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.
